name: BAKER'S MIGRAINE
description:
Dr. Baker's quest for a good night's sleep.

I'm so tired, Bob.

We need to get rid of this migraine, Bob.

Yes. Yes we do.

BAKER'S MIGRAINE

A traditional point-and-click adventure game of horror and intrigue.

CW: some disturbing themes (no blood or guts)

Made for Brackey's Jam 2021.1.
